channel.title: Remote Gui on Rosenkreutz Studio

item.title: Basic Linux Skills for Remote Controlling
item.description: Contents Instruction Access CygWin Approach Install Setting Get Accessed Putty with Xming Install Setting Get Accessed Exchange Data Useful Commands Basic Commands Work Installation and Upgrade Others Instruction Here we provides some basic instructions for how to access to the remote Linux server. We assume that the reader who learn this instruction could grant such conditions: Use a client device equipped with Windows; Has the full authority on both the client and the server; The client and the server is in the same domain.
